wikipedia_page.main: Benjamin Phelps Gibbon (1802–1851) was a Welsh line-engraver. He concentrated on animal and portrait engravings, carried out for publishers.

response: Benjamin Phelps Gibbon and Robert William Sievier studied engraving under Scriven.
A portrait of Scriven, painted by Andrew Morton, was engraved by Benjamin Phelps Gibbon as an illustration to John Pye's Patronage of British Art.
